title: The Fungible compensatory area shall be permissible for the tenants as recorded in the TP Scheme Boo
clause_text: The Fungible compensatory area shall be permissible for the tenants as recorded in the TP Scheme Book and residing in the contravening structures without charging premium and to the incentive BUA by charging premium Notes: For the purpose of this Regulations the contravening structures shall mean:
section: 33(12).Redevelopment of contravening structures included in the Final Plot of a Town Planning (TP) Scheme and Removal and re- accommodation of tolerated structures falling in the alignment of road:
